data.title: country skating on Storsjön
data.meta_description: Discover something new with Visit Sweden
data.text:
On February 5th, when the ice is thick, it's the premiere day for Medvinden's long-distance skating rink, which takes you out on wonderful skating with the mountains as a backdrop.

The course, which stretches from Östersund's harbor to Kungsgårdsviken, is 10 km (20 tor).

Buy with lunch or another packed lunch from, for example, Saluhallen and enjoy an excursion.

Inside the Winter Park, where Medvinden starts, there is Sweden's largest adventure game for skates, where all ages can practice their skating skills.

For those who prefer to skate on land, there are several options, including the Campus Oval, public skating in Östersund Arena and at the bandy court as well as at smaller rinks such as at Kärringbacken and Videplan on Frösön and at Odenvallen.

Rental of cross-country skates and a shop can be found in Vinterparken, Östersund harbour
